front.title: A Classification and Evaluation of Approaches to Transitional Multicast

abstract.t: A number of different contributions to the IETF make proposals in support of multicast during the transition from IPv4 to IPv6. This document provides a taxonomic framework to make it easier to see how the different proposals relate to each other. It analyzes the current work in progress in the light of this framework and draws a number of conclusions regarding how this work should move forward in the BEHAVE and SOFTWIRES Working Groups.
